DOC.brief_summary: Component Couple Analysis Cancer Communication CHESS , Comprehensive Health Enhancement Support System innovative technology provide information , social support skill train woman breast cancer . Previous CHESS clinical trial find improved patient outcome little known service CHESS produce result . This study examine whether breast cancer patient outcome change conceptually distinct CHESS service ( information , social support , skill train ) systematically add patient treatment resource . Primary Aims : - Determine relative efficacy different type cancer communication treatment present alone combination - Determine rout process via element work - Determine different treatment type work best .
DOC.criteria: Eligibility protocol follow : All subject must within 2 month primary breast cancer diagnosis , All subject must least 18 year age , All subject must able read write English 6thgrade level Not homeless
DOC.keyword: Control Group : Usual care Internet access
CHESS Information , Social Support & Skills Services
